timeline.title: Echo Rebellion
timeline.description: The first organized uprising of Echo Pilots against the Admin Remnant.

timeline.title: Infinite Hallway Network
timeline.description: The 'Infinite Hallway' glitch stabilizes into a traversable fast-travel network.

timeline.title: Poetry Code Decryption
timeline.description: Architect fragments reunite. 'Poetry Code' puzzles begin appearing in dungeons.

timeline.title: Ghost Fleet 2150
timeline.description: A fleet from the pre-collapse era emerges from a wormhole.

timeline.title: Void Nomad Trade Network
timeline.description: The Void Nomads establish permanent trade hubs in deep space.

timeline.title: Architect Leak
timeline.description: Source code leaks reveal the universe is a nested simulation.

timeline.title: First Memory Storm
timeline.description: Global weather event. 'Memory Storms' rewrite sector biomes temporarily.

timeline.title: Second Merge
timeline.description: Physical objects begin pixelating on a massive scale.

timeline.title: Hive Awakening
timeline.description: Glitch Mites evolve into a hive mind.

timeline.title: Subject Zero Returns
timeline.description: The first uploaded mind wakes up.

timeline.title: Echo Renaissance
timeline.description: Players gain the ability to 'merge' consciousness.

timeline.title: The Final Signal
timeline.description: The countdown reaches zero. The season ends.

factions.name: The Vanguard
factions.description: Military order dedicated to protecting the 'Status Quo'.

factions.name: Children of the Glitch
factions.description: Believes bugs are features. Worshippers of entropy.

factions.name: Void Nomads
factions.description: Traders who live in the spaces between sectors.

factions.name: Shard Weavers
factions.description: Artisans who forge equipment from stabilized glitch matter.

factions.name: Reset Heretics
factions.description: Radicals who want to force a system reset to purge corruption.

factions.name: Phantom Cartel 2.0
factions.description: The evolution of the Neon Phantom's network. Controls the black market.

factions.name: The Library
factions.description: Keepers of the old world data.
